articles.author: Charles Maynes
articles.title: Moldova barely approves its EU referendum amid allegations of Russian interference - NPR
articles.description: Moldova voted in favor of adding a path to the European Union to its constitution, and gave the incumbent president the most votes in elections Sunday, but neither result was the win leaders wanted.
articles.content: The former Soviet republic of Moldova voted in favor of securing a path into the European Union on Sunday, in a national referendum that was charged with geopolitical significance and shadowed by acc… [+5183 chars]
